### UMAP splitted by secondary condition: `{r sec_cond}`

```{r umap, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}

for (i in 1:length(list_seu)) {
  seu_name <- list_seu[[i]]@project.name
  cat(seu_name)
  print(DimPlot(list_seu[[i]], reduction = "umap", split.by = sec_cond))
}
```
